## EventHandlerOptions interface


**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface EventHandlerOptions<TCommandRequest = CommandRequest> 
```

|  [onFailure](./noisecord.eventhandleroptions.onfailure.md) |  | (this: [EventHandler](./noisecord.eventhandler.md)<!-- -->, req: TCommandRequest, error: Error) =&gt; Awaitable&lt;void&gt; | Called if the command returned a value other than <code>undefined</code> or threw an exception. |
